Name: Magical Bow
LongDescription: Enables the Pokémon to deal full damage to Dark-type enemies using Psychic-type moves. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Ralts, Kirlia, Gardevoir, and Gallade.  Finding a Magical Bow at the Croagunk Swap Shop is very lucky! Make sure you get it before someone else does! An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
